name: Flip and Flop (itch)
description:
Submission to weekly's Gamejam #137, themed "Flop".

To anyone stuck, there is a pause menu that you can access by pressing esc twice.

Programming and Direction by Gonzako
Game desing by Amy

Main art assets by the 9th rakuen.

Special thanks to:

Noble Rosethorn, Freepik and Kenney
